citation: Proclamation under the Sentencing Amendment (Sentences of Imprisonment) Act 2017 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Sentencing Amendment (Sentences of Imprisonment) Act 2017

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Sentencing Amendment (Sentences of Imprisonment) Act 2017 fix 1 July 2018 as the day on which that Act commences.

18 June 2018

C. WARNER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

ELISE ARCHER

Minister for Justice

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 27 June 2018
